text:
"The Muppet Show" is a variety television series. It aired from 1976 until 1981. The series starred Jim Henson's Muppets characters. Each episode featured a famous guest star. A revival of the show, Muppets Tonight, aired from 1996 to 1998.
The main characters on the series are Kermit the Frog, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and Gonzo the Great.
